hiveArticle.body:
Guru Shikhar is the highest point in Mount Abu and the view from there is amazing.  It is a peak in the Arbuda Mountains of Rajasthan, is the highest point (around 5600ft) of the Aravalli Range. 

![IMG_20170304_153321830.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQrCka44smDHrEH3gxVK8KK6Q5wHjgcmwr6o4neqGsKEJ/IMG_20170304_153321830.jpg)
